name: Going nuclear
description:
Bill is an engineer in a nuclear power plant. He has a problem: All fuel rods are loose and falling out! To prevent a power outage he has to put them back in...

Created for the third OneHourGameJam in a single hour. Never extended beyond that and created one year too late.

Controls: WASD to move/jump, touch a rod to throw it back in the air.

Music taken from OneHourGameJam.com and using Rattlesnake by Djayamax (released under Creative Commons 3.0 by-nd).
